TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerContact extends System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerContact Inherits Peer Implements IEquatable(Of PeerContact), ISerializable
type PeerContact = class inherit Peer interface IEquatable<PeerContact> interface ISerializable

summary.span: Represents a peer for which a user has retrieved extended information.

span.span: Represents a peer for which a user has retrieved extended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联系人表示受信任的对等方。A contact represents a trusted peer. A对象必须为远程对等方创建或"网络邻居"范围之外时，与远程对等协作的用户。A object must be created for a remote peer or for a user to collaborate with the remote peer when it is outside of the "People Near Me" scope. A对象可以作为任一在远程计算机或用户的远程计算机上运行的应用程序存在。A object can exist as either an application running on a remote computer, or the user of a remote computer. 此类的实例可以添加到该页将的联系信息存储在持久的方式。An instance of this class can be added to the which stores the contact information in a persistent manner. 从应用程序邀请进行身份验证和加密。An application invitation from a is both authenticated and encrypted. 若要接受或拒绝的对等联系人邀请的用户界面对话框还指示邀请者是受信任。The UI dialog to accept or reject an invitation from a peer contact also indicates that that the inviter is trusted. 璹綷对象意味着远程对等方可以看到其已注册应用程序、 对象和状态信息。Subscribing to a object means a remote peer can see its registered applications, objects and presence information. 璹綷，调用方必须登录到对等协作基础结构通过或签名中通过 Windows 用户界面。To subscribe to a , the caller must be signed in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via or signed in via the Windows UI. 所有其他操作不需要登录。All other operations do not require sign-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示名称可能用于区分中的联系人实例在其中可能有多个电子邮件地址，或是否存在具有相同的显示名称的多个对等节点。A display name may be used to differentiate contacts in a in instances where a may have multiple email addresses, or if there are multiple peers with the same display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当离开协作会话，是否不再需要某些对象。When a leaves a collaboration session, certain objects are no longer required. 如果此联系人必须与不是直接注册对等主机中的任何其他终结点进行合作，并且该主机期望继续与它们进行协作，主机必须注册这些终结点，在应用程序或其之前释放此对象。If this contact had been collaborating with any other endpoint(s) not directly registered with the peer host, and the host expects to continue to collaborate with them, the host must register those endpoints within an application or within its before disposing of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象用于表示邮件地址。A object is used to represent the mail address. 联系人管理器允许在一个实例内的多个电子邮件地址。The Contact Manager allows for multiple email addresses within one instance. 此属性的默认值为 `null`。The default value for this property is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要传递应从获取参数的字符串。The string to pass as the parameter should be obtained from . 此类用于简单的 XML 对象模型，以便在协作基础结构中, 使用，不要使用作为常规的 XML 对象模型的轻量实现。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the collaboration infrastructure, and not for use as a general XML object model.

summary.span: Sends an invitation to join into peer collaboration activity sponsored by the sender.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方不需要登录到才能成功完成此方法的基础结构。The caller is not required to sign-in to the infrastructure for this method to complete successfully. A从被邀请者不接受邀请协作被邀请者相同。A from the invitee is not the same as the invitee accepting the invitation to collaborate. 如果邀请发送到未安装应用程序的远程对等，将自动拒绝邀请。If an invitation is sent to a remote peer that has not installed the application, the invitation is automatically declined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSubscribed As Boolean
public: property bool IsSubscribed { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current is subscribed or unsubscribed to an endpoint.

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current is subscribed or unsubscribed to an endpoint.

summary.span: Alternatively, this property gets or sets a value specifying whether the current peer host or hosting application has subscribed or unsubscribed to this .

span.span: Alternatively, this property gets or sets a value specifying whether the current peer host or hosting application has subscribed or unsubscribed to this .

value.span: 如果此订阅到此终结点，如果联系人未订阅或已取消订阅。

span.span: if this is subscribed to this endpoint, if the contact has not subscribed or has unsubscribed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多情况下，不同时，作为对等主机。In many instances, a is not the same as a peer host. 对等主机都有一个实例内的远程对等方，并且关系是它们已邀请对等进行协作。A peer host has an instance within the of the remote peer, and the relationship is that they have invited the peer to collaborate. 终结点都有"Me"实例在其自己的联系人管理器和对等主机，但未指定关系。An endpoint has a "Me" instance within its own contact manager and the peer host, but the relationship is not specified. 如果对等主机处于，并不适用于选择的对等联系人，将其阻止，而不是从主机联系人管理器中删除其项可以具有的值。If the peer host is in the , and the peer contact chooses not to , its can have a value of blocked, rather than deleting its entry from the host Contact Manager. 没有本地对等方、 远程对等节点、 对等主机和订阅之间的多对多关系。There is a many-to-many relationship between local peers, remote peers, peer hosts, and subscriptions. 订阅是每个用户，而不是每个进程，每个应用程序，或每个域。Subscriptions are per user, rather than per process, per application, or per domain. 因此，订阅与对象是否为已订阅的联系人列表，并从中期望更新。Consequently, the subscriptions associated with a object are the list of contacts to which it has subscribed and from which it expects updates. 这些联系人要么已更新其自己的应用程序、 对象和状态信息，或它们已更新有关中的联系人信息。Those contacts either have updated their own application, object, and presence information, or they have updated information regarding contacts in the . 此属性始终返回`true`的对象是否它表示本地计算机或"Me"联系人，因为联系人始终会订阅本身。This property always returns `true` if the object is a which represents the local or "Me" contact, since a contact is always subscribed to itself.

span.span: This object has been disposed.

which represents the nickname of the .
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用于一个昵称对象当有多个对等方，具有相同的显示名称。A Nickname can be used for a object in case there are multiple peers with the same display name. 协作会话还可以使用该别名来指定更大的协作工作中常用的远程对等节点。A collaboration session can also use the nickname to designate remote peers commonly used in larger collaboration efforts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnApplicationChanged(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs appChangedArgs) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnApplicationChanged (appChangedArgs As ApplicationChangedEventArgs)

param.span: The object to be passed to delegates associated with the event.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启动、 注册或注销协作基础结构从应用程序时，将发生应用程序更改。Application changes occur when an application is launched, registered or unregistered from the collaboration infrastructure. 它们还出现时对等节点加入或离开协作会话或更改网络终结点位置。They also occur when peers join or leave a collaboration session or change network endpoint locations. 对等作用域更改还可能会影响应用程序中的更改。Peer scope changes may also effect a change in an application. 从此类继承的类可以重写此方法以在事件发生时执行其他任务。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.

span.para: 在派生类中，一定要调用基类实现此方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
In a derived class, be sure to call the base class implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是否是一种本地对等方、 远程对等方，或对此实例所表示的对等联系人等主机与是否存在无关任一终结点中或。Whether a is a local peer, remote peer, or host peer for the peer contact represented by this instance is not relevant to the presence of the in either the endpoint or the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的正确用法属性：The following code example illustrates the proper usage of the property: [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#7)]
